productName: Wednesday Morning at Five Oâ€™Clock - As the Day Begins
shortDescription: Silently closing her bedroom door. Leaving the note that she hoped would say more.
longDescription:
She goes downstairs to the kitchen

  • Clutching her handkerchief
  • Quietly turning the backdoor key
  • Stepping outside, she is free

She(we gave her most of our lives).

Is leaving (sacrificed most of our lives)

Home (we gave her everything money could buy)

She's leaving home, after living alone, for so many years (bye bye)

productName: Father Snores as His Wife Gets Into Her Dressing Gown
shortDescription: Picks up the letter that's lying there. Standing alone at the top of the stairs.
longDescription:
She breaks down and cries to her husband. "Daddy, our baby's gone."

"Why would she treat us so thoughtlessly? How could she do this to me?"
